<denchmark-h:h2>Incorrect window size on Mac OS X Lion</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11635842/opencv-not-filling-entire-image.
Basically this: @ cv::Mat cvSideDepthImage1(150, 150, CV_8UC1, cv::Scalar(100)); cv::imshow("side1", cvSideDepthImage1); @
Creates this 200x150px window:
!http://i.stack.imgur.com/HetAA.png!
When it should just show a gray 150x150 square.
This is OpenCV 2.4.9 on OS X Lion (all updates installed). </denchmark-code>
